source/include/boost/iterator.hpp

00001 //  interator.hpp workarounds for non-conforming standard libraries  ---------//
00002 
00003 //  (C) Copyright Boost.org 2000. Permission to copy, use, modify, sell and
00004 //  distribute this software is granted provided this copyright notice appears
00005 //  in all copies. This software is provided "as is" without express or implied
00006 //  warranty, and with no claim as to its suitability for any purpose.
00007 
00008 //  See http://www.boost.org/libs/utility for documentation.
00009 
00010 //  Revision History
00011 //  12 Jan 01 added <cstddef> for std::ptrdiff_t (Jens Maurer)
00012 //  28 Jun 00 Workarounds to deal with known MSVC bugs (David Abrahams)
00013 //  26 Jun 00 Initial version (Jeremy Siek)
00014 
00015 #ifndef BOOST_ITERATOR_HPP
00016 #define BOOST_ITERATOR_HPP
00017 
00018 #include <iterator>
00019 #include <cstddef>           // std::ptrdiff_t
00020 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00021 
00022 namespace boost
00023 {
00024 # if defined(BOOST_NO_STD_ITERATOR) && !defined(BOOST_MSVC_STD_ITERATOR)
00025   template <class Category, class T,
00026     class Distance = std::ptrdiff_t,
00027     class Pointer = T*, class Reference = T&>
00028   struct iterator
00029   {
00030     typedef T         value_type;
00031     typedef Distance  difference_type;
00032     typedef Pointer   pointer;
00033     typedef Reference reference;
00034     typedef Category  iterator_category;
00035   };
00036 # else
00037 
00038   // declare iterator_base in namespace detail to work around MSVC bugs which
00039   // prevent derivation from an identically-named class in a different namespace.
00040   namespace detail {
00041    template <class Category, class T, class Distance, class Pointer, class Reference>
00042 #  if !defined(BOOST_MSVC_STD_ITERATOR)
00043    struct iterator_base : std::iterator<Category, T, Distance, Pointer, Reference> {};
00044 #  else
00045    struct iterator_base : std::iterator<Category, T, Distance>
00046    {
00047      typedef Reference reference;
00048      typedef Pointer pointer;
00049      typedef Distance difference_type;
00050    };
00051 #  endif
00052   }
00053 
00054   template <class Category, class T, class Distance = std::ptrdiff_t,
00055             class Pointer = T*, class Reference = T&>
00056    struct iterator : detail::iterator_base<Category, T, Distance, Pointer, Reference> {};
00057 # endif
00058 } // namespace boost
00059 
00060 #endif // BOOST_ITERATOR_HPP
